Package math

Class Transform

java.lang.Object
math.Transform
public class Transform
extends java.lang.Object
This class handles the position, rotation and scale of an item

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Transform()
    Class constructor, initializes the position, rotation and scales to zeros

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Vector3f getPosition()
    Getter, returns the position vector of the transform
    Matrix4x4 getProjectionMatrix()
    This function returns the projection matrix of the transform for the current camera instance
    Vector3f getRotation()
    Getter, returns the rotation vector of the transform
    Vector3f getScale()
    Getter, returns the scale vector of the transform
    Matrix4x4 getTransformationMatrix()
    This function returns the transformation matrix of the transform the transformation matrix is the multiplication of the translation, rotation and scale matrix's
    Matrix4x4 getViewMatrix()
    This function returns the view matrix of the transform the view matrix is the multiplication of the rotation and translation matrix's
    Transform setPosition​(float x, float y, float z)
    Setter, sets the position of the transform from 3 floats, returns the current instance of the transform
    Transform setPosition​(Vector3f v1)
    Setter, sets the position of the transform from a 3 float vector, returns the current instance of the transform
    Transform setRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
    Setter, sets the rotation of the transform from 3 floats, returns the current instance of the transform
    Transform setRotation​(Vector3f v1)
    Setter, sets the rotation of the transform from a 3 float vector, returns the current instance of the transform

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public Transform setPosition​(Vector3f v1)

      v1 - the desired position vector
      Returns:
      the current instance of the transform

    • setPosition

      public Transform setPosition​(float x, float y, float z)
      Setter, sets the position of the transform from 3 floats, returns the current instance of the transform
      Parameters:
      x - the desired x coordinate of the transform
      y - the desired y coordinate of the transform
      z - the desired y coordinate of the transform
      Returns:
      the current instance of the transform

      Returns:
      the current instance of the transform

    • setRotation

      public Transform setRotation​(float x, float y, float z)
      Setter, sets the rotation of the transform from 3 floats, returns the current instance of the transform
      Parameters:
      x - the desired x rotation of the transform
      y - the desired y rotation of the transform
      z - the desired y rotation of the transform
      Returns:
      the current instance of the transform
